description:
* Based on http://anidb.net/cr13938 [Fujiko Fujio A]`s horror manga.
In a society filled with people who do whatever with their lives, there are some who struggle with it or never achieved their goals. The story focuses on individuals who meet a shadowy and ominous salesman, http://anidb.net/ch86705 [Moguro Fukuzou], who promises them a better life if they follow his advice. However, the clients that Moguro meet often cheat, refuse to rely on his help, or worse - deny that they received assistance at all. When this invariably happens, Fukuzou punishes his clients by using their reliance on his aid against them. With their lives ruined, he is satisfied with his job and looks for more potential clients.
Source: Wikipedia

REGULAR.description:
Part A: Nakajima and Sakamaki work in a certain office and one day, Sakamaki offers to take Nakajima to a certain place for lunch. The place happened to be a club named “Daydream” that was in the basement of the same building that their office was in. There, Nakajima meets Moguro and is warned, but ends up falling for a pretty hostess named Haruka.
Part B: Mitsuko had been shopping excessively in order to relieve the stress she was feeling from work. One day while she was out shopping, Moguro talks to her. Despite having some doubts, she ends up taking up his invitation and meets him at Bar Ma no Su...
Source: crunchyroll

Part B: Deyashiro ends up quitting his job and starts going to the Fantasy Company through a referral by Moguro. The purpose of that company was to retrain people in order to be able to enter the work force again...

Naoki Junichi was in love with a woman he’d always see at the train station platform. Moguro notices this and tells him that he’ll bring the two together. Despite having some suspicions about Moguro, Naoki’s feelings for the woman only grow stronger...

REGULAR.description:
Part A:
Uchinaki gets his foot stepped on by Moguro one morning on the rush hour train. To make it up to him, Moguro treats him to a cup of coffee. Uchinaki then talks about his depression concerning work, which leads to Moguro leading him to a dream-like place...
Part B:
Monomochi Tomie is living the dream with the perfect home and perfect family, however her heart still seemed empty. Moguro then introduces her to someone who manages to convince her that she needs to declutter her life. She then starts decluttering, but ends up not being able to throw things away, and something awful happens.
Source: crunchyroll

Part A: Tayori ends up getting film that doesn’t belong to him developed, and falling in love with the woman in the pictures. He ends up asking Moguro to help him meet her. Despite all the uncertainty, he goes to meet her and something insane happens!
 
Part B: Oite Kazuhito just retired from his job that he had been at for many years. As soon as he got home, there were divorce papers from his wife waiting for him. After that, he was living a lonely life, unable to see his granddaughter. Then one day, Moguro comes up with an idea...

Part A: Ochiiri has a great home and loving wife. He lives a life that everyone would be envious of, but he had a problem that he couldn’t mention to anyone. One day, he happens to encounter Moguro in a dark alleyway and ends up telling him his secret that he couldn’t even tell his wife.
 
Part B: Mamano Ari works hard to make her daughter’s dream of becoming a top idol come true. Ari had no doubts that her daughter would succeed. Ari encounters Moguro one day and he warns her about something, but she doesn’t listen. However, she receives shocking news from her daughter...

Amikumo Tsuyoshi enjoys chatting with people he doesn’t know online, but ends up in an argument with one of the random people. He eventually ends up kicked out of the chatroom. He then receives something from Moguro and attempts to get revenge, but... Chikako wants to go on a vacation somewhere someday, but her stingy nature has prevented her from doing so. She then meets Moguro, who tells her about a ridiculously cheap vacation package, and she just can’t say no. However, there was a catch that no one would’ve expected...
